subject: Follow-up call regarding proposal
notes: Discussed proposal details and timeline. Sarah confirmed budget is approved for Q4. Next step is internal stakeholder review.

subject: Implementation timeline discussion
notes: Sent detailed implementation plan and timeline. Michael requested faster rollout if possible. Exploring expedited options.

subject: Product demo - Creative Hub team
notes: Conducted comprehensive demo for operations team. Great reception, especially reporting features. Scheduling follow-up with executives.

subject: Discovery call - current process review
notes: Detailed discussion about current sales process and pain points. Identified key areas where our solution can add value.

subject: Security compliance documentation
notes: Sent security whitepaper and compliance certifications. Lisa will review with their technical team and get back to us.

subject: Introduction call
notes: Initial conversation about their marketing technology needs. Sarah expressed strong interest in our CRM solution.

subject: Contract review meeting
notes: Reviewed contract terms and conditions. Minor adjustments requested on payment terms. Legal team to finalize.
